attributes.action: halt the increasing amounts of immigrants into this country and the benefits that they get, and to put the british people and services first.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by closing the doors on more and more immigrants entering the country, all the money saved can go towards public services, nhs, education, better policing etc.., why is it so hard for politicians to see that the vast majority of people in this country are sick of taxpayers money being wasted on people who are just coming here for an easy ride, with benefits and housing etc.. i think a lot of people would agree that its time to put the british and the british people first.
